parameters.fetchXml:
<fetch version="1.0" output-format="xml-platform" mapping="logical" distinct="true">
  <entity name="leidos_projectfunding">
    <attribute name="leidos_name" />
    <attribute name="leidos_projectfundingreference" />
    <attribute name="leidos_projectfundingid" />
    <order attribute="leidos_name" descending="false" />
    <filter type="and">
      <condition attribute="statuscode" operator="ne" value="2" />
      <condition attribute="leidos_previousfunding" operator="not-null" />
      <condition attribute="leidos_parentproject" operator="eq" value ="@{outputs('Get_Project')?['body/leidos_projectid']}" />
    </filter>
    <link-entity name="leidos_projectfunding" from="leidos_projectfundingid" to="leidos_previousfunding" visible="false" link-type="outer" alias="prev">
      <attribute name="leidos_projectfundingreference" />
      <attribute name="leidos_projectfundingid" />
    </link-entity>
    <link-entity name="leidos_projectcost" from="leidos_projectcostid" to="leidos_parentprojectcost" visible="false" link-type="outer" alias="cost">
      <attribute name="leidos_costtype" />
    </link-entity>
  </entity>
</fetch>

<fetch version="1.0" output-format="xml-platform" mapping="logical" distinct="true">
  <entity name="leidos_paymentclaim">
    <attribute name="leidos_paymentclaimid" />
    <attribute name="leidos_paymentclaimreference" />
    <attribute name="leidos_costfundingline" />
    <attribute name="leidos_costfundingreference" />
    <order attribute="leidos_paymentclaimreference" descending="false" />
    <filter type="and">
      <condition attribute="leidos_costfundingline" operator="eq" value="@{outputs('get_PrevId')}" />
    </filter>
    <link-entity name="leidos_transactionline" from="leidos_paymentclaim" to="leidos_paymentclaimid" link-type="inner" alias="tline">
    <attribute name="leidos_transactionlineid" />      
      <filter type="and">
        <condition attribute="statuscode" operator="ne" value="2" />
      </filter>
      <link-entity name="leidos_transaction" from="leidos_transactionid" to="leidos_transaction" link-type="inner" alias="tran">
        <filter type="and">
          <condition attribute="leidos_postingyear" operator="eq" value="@{variables('CurrentFY')}" />
          <condition attribute="statuscode" operator="in">
            <value>100000004</value>
            <value>100000005</value>
          </condition>
        </filter>
      </link-entity>
    </link-entity>
   </entity>
</fetch>

<fetch version="1.0" output-format="xml-platform" mapping="logical" distinct="true">
  <entity name="leidos_claimadjustmentline">
    <attribute name="leidos_claimadjustmentlineid" />
    <attribute name="leidos_name" />
    <attribute name="createdon" />
    <order attribute="leidos_name" descending="false" />
    <filter type="and">
      <condition attribute="leidos_costfunding" operator="eq" value="@{outputs('get_PrevId')}" />
    </filter>
    <link-entity name="leidos_transactionline" from="leidos_claimadjustmentline" to="leidos_claimadjustmentlineid" link-type="inner" alias="tline">
      <attribute name="leidos_transactionlineid" />
      <filter type="and">
        <condition attribute="statuscode" operator="ne" value="2" />
      </filter>
      <link-entity name="leidos_transaction" from="leidos_transactionid" to="leidos_transaction" link-type="inner" alias="ad">
        <filter type="and">
          <condition attribute="statuscode" operator="in">
            <value>100000004</value>
            <value>100000005</value>
          </condition>
          <condition attribute="leidos_postingyear" operator="eq" value="@{variables('CurrentFY')}" />
        </filter>
      </link-entity>
    </link-entity>
  </entity>
</fetch>
